## Source: amazon-inspector (46f4e9359f962e7c7082988e5a0af26520798dd321ecda643cb8d14268ec9c5b)
The package breadcrumb-service was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (883dd2539c160123211625ac16fcb503ddaa9a07ba28e19784ab809cf8b04707)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'breadcrumb-service' @ 999.9.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
